exercises.name: Goblet Squats
exercises.desc: Hold a dumbbell at chest height and squat with heels flat.

exercises.name: Wall Sit (Weighted Optional)
exercises.desc: Back against wall, knees at 90°, hold dumbbell optional.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Bench Press
exercises.desc: Press from chest to full lockout, elbows slightly tucked.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Lateral Raises
exercises.desc: Raise dumbbells to shoulder height; maintain tension on delts.

exercises.name: Walking Lunges
exercises.desc: Step forward into lunge, knee above ankle, push off with front heel.

exercises.name: Arnold Press
exercises.desc: Rotate palms outward as you press up for full shoulder range.

exercises.name: Triceps Kickbacks
exercises.desc: Extend elbows fully while keeping upper arm stable.

exercises.name: Incline Push-Ups
exercises.desc: Tight core, lower until chest nearly touches elevated surface.

exercises.name: Standing Calf Raises
exercises.desc: Slow controlled rise onto toes, pause at top.
